CustomField.description: Daylight Savings Time adjust time to '17:00:00'. Regular Time to '18:00:00'
CustomField.formula: IF( AND(Account__r.Auto_Approval_Not_Applicable__c = FALSE, NOT(ISBLANK(Marketing_Collateral_Auto_Approval_Date__c))), IF( ((DATETIMEVALUE(Marketing_Collateral_Auto_Approval_Date__c)+0.209) - NOW()) > -0.80 , TEXT( FLOOR( ((DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(Marketing_Collateral_Auto_Approval_Date__c) + " " + '19:00:00')+0.209) - NOW())) ) & " days " & TEXT( FLOOR( MOD(((DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(Marketing_Collateral_Auto_Approval_Date__c) + " " + '19:00:00')+0.209) - NOW()) * 24, 24 ) )) & " hours " & TEXT( ROUND( MOD( ((DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(Marketing_Collateral_Auto_Approval_Date__c) + " " + '19:00:00')+0.209) - NOW()) * 24 * 60, 60 ), 0 ) ) & " minutes", TEXT(Status__c) ), IF(Account__r.Auto_Approval_Not_Applicable__c = TRUE, "No Auto-Approval Process", " " ))
CustomField.label: Marketing Collateral Countdown
